logo.title: BDLive - Stream your life with joy! Your go-to platform for live events, shows, tutorials, and more.

search.placeholder: Search for streams, events, or users...

home.title: Welcome to BDLive
home.description: Your go-to streaming spot for catching live events, shows, tutorials, funny moments and more easily!

register.title: Create your BDLive account
register.description: Join our community to start streaming and sharing your favorite moments.
register.heading: Sign up on BDLive
register.backButtonLabel: Already got an account? Sign in

username.label: Username
username.description: You can always change it later.

email.label: Email
email.description: We might send you important account updates.

password.label: Password
password.description: Gotta be at least 8 characters long!

successAlert.title: Check your inbox!
successAlert.description: We've sent a verification email. If you don't see it, peek in your spam folder.

register.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong creating your account.

verify.title: Verify your BDLive account
verify.description: Almost there! Just verify your email to start streaming.

errorAlert.title: Verification failed
errorAlert.description: We couldn't verify your account. Please try again or contact support.

verify.successMessage: Your account has been successfully verified.
verify.errorMessage: Error verifying your account. Please try again.

login.title: Log in to BDLive
login.description: Welcome back! Log in to continue.
login.heading: Log in to your BDLive account

login.label: Username or Email
login.description: Enter your username or email to log in.

password.label: Password
password.description: Enter your password to log in.

pin.label: Enter your PIN
pin.description: Please enter the 6-digit PIN sent to your email.

login.errorMessage: Invalid username or password. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset your BDLive password
resetPassword.heading: Forgot your password?
resetPassword.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.

email.label: Email
email.description: We'll send you a link to reset your password.

successAlert.title: Check your inbox!
successAlert.description: We've sent you an email with instructions to reset your password.

resetPassword.errorMessage: Error sending reset link. Please try again.

updatePassword.title: Update your BDLive password
updatePassword.heading: Set a new password
updatePassword.description: Enter your new password to continue.

password.label: New Password
password.description: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

passwordRepeat.label: Retype Password
passwordRepeat.description: Re-enter your new password to confirm.

updatePassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully updated.
updatePassword.errorMessage: Error updating password. Please try again.

logout.title: Log out from BDLive
logout.description: By logging out, you will be signed out of your account. If you want to log back in, you will need to enter your credentials again on the login page.

successAlert.title: Logged out successfully
successAlert.description: You have been logged out from BDLive successfully. You can log in again anytime.

logout.successMessage: You have been logged out successfully.

deactivate.title: Deactivate your account
deactivate.description: By deactivating your account, you will lose access to all your data and settings.
deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account

email.label: Email
email.description: Your email that you used during registration

password.label: Password
password.description: The password you used during registration

pin.label: 6-digit code
pin.description: A code has been sent to your email. If you enabled Telegram notifications, we sent the code there as well

deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

dashboard.title: Dashboard - BDLive
dashboard.description: Manage your streams, check analytics, and customize your profile.

settings.title: Settings - BDLive
settings.description: Manage your account settings, profile, and preferences.

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Customize your BDLive experience by adjusting your account settings, profile information, and preferences.

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Manage your profile information, including your username, display name, and bio.

avatar.heading: Profile Picture

confirmDialog.heading: Remove Profile Picture
confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile picture? This action cannot be undone.

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10 MB.

username.label: Username
username.description: This is how others will find you on BDLive.

displayName.label: Display Name
displayName.description: You can use uppercase letters in your display name as you wish.

bio.label: About Me
bio.description: The information about yourself should contain no more than 300 characters.

title.label: Link Title
title.description: The title of the social media link, e.g., YouTube, Twitter, etc.

url.label: Link URL
url.description: Enter the full URL, e.g., https://www.youtube.com/@shamscorner

deleteConfirmDialog.heading: Delete Social Media Link
deleteConfirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this social media link? This action cannot be undone.

reorderMessage.success: Order of social media links changed successfully
reorderMessage.error: Error changing order of social media links

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including email, password, and security options.

security.heading: Security Settings
security.description: Set up two-factor authentication and auto-renewals for enhanced protection of your data.

deactivation.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. Your account will be completely deleted after 7 days. Until then, you can contact support to restore access and unlock your account.

oldPassword.label: Old Password
oldPassword.description: Enter your current password to verify your identity before changing your password.

newPassword.label: New Password
newPassword.description: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long. It is recommended to use special characters for added security.

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Enhance your account security by enabling TOTP authentication. This additional layer of protection requires entering a unique code, making your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access.

enable.heading: Enabling TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP

pin.label: PIN Code
pin.description: Enter the 6-digit code generated by your authentication app.

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to proceed?

pin.label: PIN Code
pin.description: Enter the 6-digit code generated by your authentication app.

deactivation.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivation.description: Know before you deactivate your account. Access can only be restored within 7 days. After that, your account will be permanently deleted.

confirmDialog.heading: Confirm Deactivation
confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Access can only be restored within 7 days.

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the look and feel of your BDLive experience. You can change the theme, language, and accent color of the website.

theme.heading: Change Theme
theme.description: Select a theme for the website. You can choose between light and dark themes.
theme.successMessage: You are now using a {theme} theme

language.heading: Website Language
language.description: Select a language for the website. The content will be displayed in the selected language.
language.successMessage: Language settings have been successfully updated

color.heading: Theme Color
color.description: Choose a theme color for the website. This color will be used for buttons, links, and other interactive elements.

followers.title: Followers - BDLive
followers.description: View and manage your followers on BDLive.
